stdout:
Table	Create Table
brain_knowledge_relationships	CREATE TABLE `brain_knowledge_relationships` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `from_concept_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `concept_id_1` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `relationship_type` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'is_a, part_of, treats, causes, associated_with',
  `to_concept_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `concept_id_2` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `confidence` float DEFAULT '1' COMMENT 'Confidence score 0-1',
  `source` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_concept_1` (`concept_id_1`),
  KEY `idx_concept_2` (`concept_id_2`),
  KEY `idx_relationship_type` (`relationship_type`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`concept_id_1`) REFERENCES `hfH9ioTEzRzswFjESim83C`.`brain_knowledge_concepts` (`concept_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`concept_id_2`) REFERENCES `hfH9ioTEzRzswFjESim83C`.`brain_knowledge_concepts` (`concept_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
